00013     public class GPSListener
00014     {
00015         private static GPSListener instance = null;
00016         private static readonly object padlock = new object();

00021         public event Action<GpsPosition> OnLocationChanged = null;
00022         
00026         private Gps gps = new Gps();

00028         private GPSListener() { }

00030         public static GPSListener GetInstance
00031         {
00032             get
00033             {
00034                 lock (padlock)
00035                 {
00036                     if (instance == null) instance = new GPSListener();
00037                     return instance;

00045         public void OpenGPS()
00046         {
00047             if (gps.Opened)
00048                 return;
00049 
00050             gps.Open();
00051             gps.LocationChanged += new LocationChangedEventHandler(GpsLocationChanged);
00052         }
00053 
00057         private void GpsLocationChanged(object sender, LocationChangedEventArgs args)
00058         {
00059             GpsPosition position = args.Position;
00060             if (position != null && OnLocationChanged != null)
00061             {
00062                 OnLocationChanged(args.Position);
00063             }
00064         }
00065 
00070         public void CloseGPS()
00071         {
00072             if (gps.Opened && OnLocationChanged == null)
00073             {
00074                 gps.Close();
00075             }
00076         }
00077     }
